Fitting an Edge Model

Source: vignettes/edge_models.Rmd
edge_models.Rmd
library(bisonR)
data("binary_ex1")
df <- binary_ex1
head(df)
#>   node_1 node_2   type_1   type_2 event location
#> 1    Rey   Leia Lifeform Lifeform     1        B
#> 2    Rey   Leia Lifeform Lifeform     1        F
#> 3    Rey   Leia Lifeform Lifeform     0        C
#> 4    Rey   Leia Lifeform Lifeform     1        C
#> 5    Rey   Leia Lifeform Lifeform     1        B
#> 6    Rey   Leia Lifeform Lifeform     1        B
fit_edge <- edge_model(event ~ dyad(node_1, node_2), data=df, data_type="binary", method="mcmc", mc_cores=4, verbose=TRUE)
plot_trace(fit_edge)
#> 'pars' not specified. Showing first 10 parameters by default.

summary(fit_edge)
#> === Fitted BISoN edge model ===
#> Data type: binary
#> Formula: event ~ dyad(node_1, node_2)
#> Number of nodes: 8
#> Number of dyads: 28
#> Directed: FALSE
#> === Edge list summary ===
#>                   median     5%    95%
#> Rey <-> Leia       0.803 -0.032  1.717
#> Rey <-> Obi-Wan    1.851  1.199  2.609
#> Leia <-> Obi-Wan   2.099  1.379  2.910
#> Rey <-> Luke       1.291  0.314  2.357
#> Leia <-> Luke      1.057  0.411  1.752
#> Obi-Wan <-> Luke   0.698 -0.151  1.636
#> Rey <-> C-3PO     -2.354 -3.356 -1.502
#> Leia <-> C-3PO    -2.263 -3.172 -1.476
#> Obi-Wan <-> C-3PO -1.209 -1.878 -0.600
#> Luke <-> C-3PO    -1.597 -2.278 -0.966
#> Rey <-> BB-8      -0.836 -1.371 -0.330
#> Leia <-> BB-8     -1.682 -2.811 -0.656
#> Obi-Wan <-> BB-8  -0.778 -1.375 -0.210
#> Luke <-> BB-8     -1.524 -2.262 -0.873
#> C-3PO <-> BB-8    -1.195 -1.803 -0.621
#> Rey <-> R2-D2     -1.176 -2.148 -0.328
#> Leia <-> R2-D2    -1.318 -1.898 -0.792
#> Obi-Wan <-> R2-D2 -1.751 -2.574 -1.055
#> Luke <-> R2-D2    -1.158 -1.728 -0.644
#> C-3PO <-> R2-D2   -1.315 -2.233 -0.456
#> BB-8 <-> R2-D2    -1.475 -2.044 -0.965
#> Rey <-> D-O       -1.436 -2.099 -0.865
#> Leia <-> D-O      -1.365 -2.265 -0.530
#> Obi-Wan <-> D-O   -1.723 -2.445 -1.089
#> Luke <-> D-O      -1.325 -1.999 -0.704
#> C-3PO <-> D-O     -1.629 -2.616 -0.748
#> BB-8 <-> D-O      -2.192 -3.268 -1.264
#> R2-D2 <-> D-O     -0.568 -1.324  0.161
plot_network(fit_edge, lwd=2)
